name: Shapes and Dots
description:
The Blackthornprod GAMEJAM #3 entry:

Rules:

  • Earn as many points as possible in the time given. 
  • Drag and drop the shapes onto dots. 
  • Mind the red ones though! They are very time consuming. 
  • LESS time you will have with MORE red dots collected

Controls: Mouse 

Credits:

  • Programming: Stup
  • Art: Stup 
  • Music: beepbox.co
  • Font: Anke Print 
  • Sound effects: My pen 
  • Engine: Godot 3.2.2
